title: The Boss Is in a Bad Mood Again - Novel Updates
tags: Childcare   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Children   Misunderstandings   Seduction
author: 叶限
description:
The boss is in a bad mood again!!!! Why? As the most influential gang leader who holds everyone in awe, Zhou Yunshen should be utterly disgraced by this Han Yi!!! This is intolerable!

And Mr. Zhou believes the best way to revenge is to conquer this man who brings him humiliation.

Hey, wait, things seem to have gone astray? Since when did Mr. Zhou become the A-lister actor, Han Yi's agent and baby-sitter????

Mr. Zhou: I'm tricked, and trapped!>
